trans-unit.source: 0-based index of the item in the header control

trans-unit.source: Set of bit flags specifying which members of the structure must be filled in by the owner of the control. This value can be a combination of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: Set of bit flags specifying which members of the structure must be filled in by the owner of the control.
This value can be a combination of the following values:

target.mrk: Set of bit flags specifying which members of the structure must be filled in by the owner of the control.
This value can be a combination of the following values:

trans-unit.source: $HDI_TEXT - The Text field must be filled in

seg-source.mrk: $HDI_TEXT - The Text field must be filled in

target.mrk: $HDI_TEXT - The Text field must be filled in

trans-unit.source: $HDI_IMAGE - The Image field must be filled in

trans-unit.source: $HDI_DI_SETITEM - A return value. Indicates that the control should store the item information and not ask for it again.

seg-source.mrk: $HDI_DI_SETITEM - A return value.
Indicates that the control should store the item information and not ask for it again.

target.mrk: $HDI_DI_SETITEM - A return value.
Indicates that the control should store the item information and not ask for it again.

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a null terminated string containing the text that will be displayed for the header item

trans-unit.source: Size of the buffer that Text points to

seg-source.mrk: Size of the buffer that Text points to

target.mrk: Size of the buffer that Text points to

trans-unit.source: 0-based index of an image within the image list. The specified image will be displayed with the header item, but it does not take the place of the item's bitmap. If iImage is set to $I_IMAGECALLBACK, the control requests image information for this item by using an $HDN_GETDISPINFO notification message.

seg-source.mrk: 0-based index of an image within the image list.
The specified image will be displayed with the header item, but it does not take the place of the item's bitmap.
If iImage is set to $I_IMAGECALLBACK, the control requests image information for this item by using an $HDN_GETDISPINFO notification message.

target.mrk: 0-based index of an image within the image list.
The specified image will be displayed with the header item, but it does not take the place of the item's bitmap.
If iImage is set to $I_IMAGECALLBACK, the control requests image information for this item by using an $HDN_GETDISPINFO notification message.

trans-unit.source: An application-defined value to associate with the item
